description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref:P0716.17 approved following appeal (APP/B5480/W/18/3198021) dated 09\01\2019 to allow for minor changes to the front & rear elevations of block A and rear elevations of block B (Demolition of the existing building and erection of two replacement front and rear blocks comprising a total of 35no. residential units and a ground floor commercial unit with a flexible use as A1 retail/A2 financial and professional services/A3 restaurant and cafes/B1 office/D1 non-residential/D2 assembly and leisure)
decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
路	Alterations (widening and slight relocation) of the fenestration serving the 2 bedrooms within the rear elevation (elevation 5) of block B)
路	The previously approved gas and electricity meter cupboards within the side elevation of block A (elevation 2) are now omitted

路	Minor elevational changes to the front elevation (elevation 1) of block A, incorporating an additional vertical column within the commercial frontage element, and the substation at ground floor level is now accessed from the front rather than the side

路	To elevation 3 (the rear elevation of block A) the amendment comprises revised openings for the automatic opening vents located on each of the floors directly above the ground floor rear entrance door serving the lift and
The permission hereby granted does not supercede the previously imposed conditions.
